DOC.brief_summary: The present study design assess bioequivalence pharmacokinetic profiling brand generic formulation darifenacin [ Darisec ( R ) ] vs. innovator [ Enablex ( R ) ] healthy volunteer high fat breakfast . The bioequivalence evaluate use : - Area Under Curve ( AUC ) , - peak plasma concentration ( Cmax ) . Safety evaluate recording : - vital sign - adverse event , - laboratory analysis . - EKG chest XRays . Bioequivalence claim drug comply local regulatory requirement , eg . : - mean AUCt/AUCr 90 % confidence interval within 0.80-1.25 - mean Cmaxt/Cmaxr 90 % confidence interval within 0.80-1.25 .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Two-periods Crossover Bioequivalence Study Darifenacin Tablets Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: Darifenacin muscarinic receptor antagonist drug use treat overactive bladder . There new formulation darifenacin extend release develop argentinian pharmaceutical company , accord regional regulation , bioequivalence study perform put market . The purpose study evaluate relative bioavailability pharmacokinetic profiling brand generic formulation darifenacin [ Darisec ( R ) 15 mg ] vs. innovator [ Enablex ( R ) 15 mg ] 24 healthy uruguayan volunteer high fat breakfast 1000 calorie ( 50 % fat , 35 % carbohydrate ( sugar , flour , etc . ) 15 & protein ) establish average bioequivalence . The bioequivalence evaluate use outcome measure describe later . The pharmacokinetic characteristic drug describe calculate : - time Cmax ( Tmax ) - elimination constant ( Ke ) , - elimination half-life ( t1/2e ) , - systemic clearance ( Cls . Safety evaluate recording : - vital sign ( blood pressure , heart rate , body temperature ) - adverse event , - laboratory analysis ( hemogram , hepatic enzyme , creatinine , sugar blood , etc. ) . - EKG chest XRays . Bioequivalence claim drug comply local FDA regulatory requirement , eg . : - mean AUCt/AUCr 90 % confidence interval within 0.80-1.25 - mean Cmaxt/Cmaxr 90 % confidence interval within 0.80-1.25 . Safety evaluate compare incidence adverse events/adverse effect product .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 18 50 year age ( inclusive ) In good health , determine lack clinically significant abnormality screen judged physician . Female subject require use medically accept method hormonal contraception abstinence throughout entire study period one week study complete . Body mass index within range 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 weight least 45 kg . Known hypersensitivity severe adverse event darifenacin similar drug . Urinary retention , narrowangle glucoma , myasthenia gravis , severe hepatic impairment , severe ulcerative colitis , toxic megacolon . Symptomatic hiatus hernia , erosive symptomatic gastroesophageal reflux disease/heartburn ( > 2 day week ) , severe constipation , gastrointestinal obstructive disorder , gastric retention . Clinically significant cardiac abnormality , faint , low blood pressure upon stand , irregular heartbeat . Acute chronic bronchospastic disease ( include asthma Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) . Clinically significant drug allergy history atopic allergy ( asthma , urticaria , eczematous dermatitis ) . Smokers 5 cigarette week . Regular use drug know induce inhibit hepatic drug metabolism ( particularly affect CYP2D6 ) within 30 day prior study drug administration . Any surgical medical condition wich might significantly alter absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug may jeopardize participation study . Immunodeficiency disease , include positive HIV ( Elisa Western blot ) test result . Positive hepatitis B Surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C test result . Drug alcohol abuse within 6 month prior dose . Use prescription drug within 1 month prior dose , overthecounter medication ( vitamine , herbal supplement , dietary supplement ) within 2 week prior dose . Paracetamol ibuprofen acceptable . Participation clinical investigation within 4 week prior dose . Donation loss 400 ml blood within 2 month prior dose . significant illness within 2 week prior dose . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
